pageProduct.name: Provoke Touch Of Silver Colour Care Conditioner 1000ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

PRO:VOKE Touch Of Silver Colour Care Conditioner’s creamy, protective formula strengthens and helps repair damaged hair by infusing extra moisture for an improved smooth and silky texture.

Warnings

For External Use Only

Common Uses

With Optical Brighteners, this conditioner instantly boosts shine and keeps hair colour rich. By protecting the structure of the hair and preventing colour from dulling, moisture and softness are restored, leaving hair feeling nourished and deeply moisturised.

Ingredients

Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Coco-Glucoside Tartrate,Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate,PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate,Glycol Distearate,Laureth-4,Cocamidopropyl Betaine,Coco-Glucoside,Glyceryl Oleate,Polyquaternium-10,Propylene Glycol,PEG-55 Propylene Glycol Oleate,Carbomer,Benzophenone-4,Salicylic Acid,Laureth-2,Disodium EDTA,Sodium Benzoate,Sodium Chloride,Formic Acid,Parfum,Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde,Butylphenyl Methylpropional,Linalool,Acid Violet 43,HC Blue No. 2

Directions

After shampooing, run conditioner through the length of your hair and rinse thoroughly.For very dry or damaged hair, leave conditioner on for up to 10 minutes.
